com.tsgrp.migration.connect

Interface Connection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnection, ExcelConnection, FileConnection, JdbcConnection, SFTPConnection, SimpleConnection

    public interface Connection
    Connection interface: every Connection must implement isConnected(), and most will avail themselves of the "dynabean-like" capability of the getAttr(String), setAttr(String, Object) and reset() methods implemented in the AbstractConnector class.

    The Connection is implemented as a dynabean to allow "loose-typing", although implementors are encouraged to write specific properties and methods for the concrete connections, storing the values themselves in this parent Map.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getAttr(java.lang.String attrName)
      Return the attribute by name, or null.
      boolean isConnected()
      Communicate whether the connection is "connected" as defined by the implementing connection.
      void reset()
      Clear all instance variables; does NOT release any resources, only the variables themselves.
      void setAttr(java.lang.String attrName, java.lang.Object obj)
      Add (or replace) the given attribute by name.

      • getAttr

        java.lang.Object getAttr(java.lang.String attrName)
        Return the attribute by name, or null.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Attribute object stored in the connection

      • setAttr

        void setAttr(java.lang.String attrName,
             java.lang.Object obj)
        Add (or replace) the given attribute by name.
        Parameters:
        obj - An Object to store in the Connection
        attrName - the attribute name

      • reset

        void reset()
        Clear all instance variables; does NOT release any resources, only the variables themselves.

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Communicate whether the connection is "connected" as defined by the implementing connection.
        Returns:
        true if connected, false otherwise
